name: Group 3 - Spelunka-Bot
description:
Overview

You play as a robot who is trying to escape the mines! Bomb your way through 50 levels to reach the end! Definitely don't use the debug menu option located on the bottom right corner of the main menu to skip to level 50!

Defeat all enemies on screen to access the door to move to the next level. Destroy bricks to have a chance of getting a power-up!

Controls WASD
Movement
E
Place a bomb
Esc/P
Pauses the game
Power Ups Made by Group 3
  • Roy Fu
  • Padriac Heaton
  • Donavan Le
  • Rhys Vincent
  • Long Vo
